referral_claim_steps: To claim your referral reward: log in → open 'Referrals' tab → click 'Claim'. If it doesn’t appear within 24 hours, open a ticket.
payout_window: Referral payouts are processed daily. Most are completed within 2–4 hours, occasionally up to 24 hours.
min_payout: Minimum payout amount is $50 USD or equivalent.
bonus_expiry: Referral bonuses expire if unclaimed within 30 days.
affiliate_terms: Each user can have only one referral account. Multiple accounts will void bonuses.
